title: Audi
description: This is my very first project using HTML and CSS — a simple landing page inspired by Audi's design.

title: Job kz
description: This was my first JavaScript project — Job KZ, a platform where users can view job vacancies.

title: Movie Detail
description: Movie Detail is a small React app where users can search for movies and view detailed information about them.

description: Gemini Chat is a lightweight project where I integrated Google's Gemini to create an interactive chat experience.

title: To Do List
description: A simple to-do list app built with React, allowing users to add, complete, and delete tasks.

title: Memory Game
description: This is my first mini game using JavaScript — a simple and fun fruit matching game.

title: laminate flooring
description: My first freelance project was a website for a laminate flooring business.
